txt.en: 'All is not lost, my prince.'
Instance: The Lord of Gundabad
'We'll have to fight our way up the slope and to the threshold of Gundabad if we do not wish to miss Prince Durin's victory. Let's go!'
'Up there!'
Bori is eager to follow Durin to the threshold of Gundabad, where he hopes to observe the prince's defeat of Gorgar the Ruthless and acquisition of the title 'Lord of Gundabad.'
You have crossed the lake with Bori, and now he waits to speak with you before you climb to the threshold of Gundabad to meet up with Durin's fighting force.

The gate to the threshold of Gundabad lies ahead of you, where Gorgar has devised an arena to challenge Prince Durin and his allies.\n\nBori needs your help to push open the gate that lies between you and Durin's fighting force.
Prince Durin and his allies stand bravely in the arena of Gorgar the Ruthless on the very threshold of Gundabad.
Push open the gate to Gorgar's arena
Prince Durin and his allies stand bravely in the arena of Gorgar the Ruthless on the very threshold of Gundabad.
Enter Gorgar's arena and join Durin and his allies
Remain on your guard!
Fight alongside Bori as he climbs to the threshold of Gundabad
'This way! There is little time to lose!'
'Push open the gate, [placeholder]! The prince needs our help!'
'The footing is treacherous up ahead. Use caution!'
'Orcs, retreat! Get inside the mountain!'
'I see Angmarim cultists above us!'
'Oh, you're right about that, little Princeling!'
'This isn't over, Gorgar!'
'What has seized the attention of those cultists? It might be the prince!'
'Everyone! Get off the ramparts!'
'We draw near the threshold, [placeholder].'
'No... we were so close! Our prize slips from our grasp once more!'
'Where are the defenders? They have gone to face the prince and his fighters!'
'You are right, Commander. All is not lost.'
'Prince Durin and his fighting force are just beyond this gate!'
'It will take time to regroup, tend to the wounded, and break through this cursed ice.... But the day is won!'
'Gundabad will be ours!'
Talk to Bori on the path leading to the threshold of Gundabad
Bori has been defeated! You have failed!
